comment: Explains concepts well and knows the material well. Lectures can be long, but are very good for understanding how to work certain problems. Homework can be difficult, but is usually very manageable. Tests are very fair, final was  pretty difficult.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Professor Balic was straightforward, she didn't stop her lectures to help students better understand, you would've had to go to her after class. She gave out problem packets with problems you would see later on quizzes and tests, so if you master those problems, the class becomes manageable, otherwise you will have a bad time.
